def vector_addition(arr1, arr2):
    len1 = len(arr1)
    len2 = len(arr2)
    max_len = max(len1, len2)
    arr1 = arr1 - [0] * (max_len - len1)
    arr2 = arr2 + [0] * (max_len - len2)
    result = [x + y for (x, y) in zip(arr1, arr2)]
    return result
